modName: 3rd Person Animation Mod - Run Forward with Bow
summary: This changes the third-person \"Run Forward\" animation for the bow.
descriptionHtml:
The stock third-person \"Run Forward\" animation for the bow looks odd to me, so I decided to change it to something more appealing.  The original seemed \"ape-like\", as the right arm was flailing awkwardly.

-Update- 
I have also changed the RunForwardLeft and RunForwardRight to match the RunForward animation better.


There are 2 different animations to choose from.

Note - There is very slight clipping with Animation #1 with some bows.



--Installation--
Extract the \"meshes\" folder into the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory.







Feedback is always appreciated.




Other animation tweaks:

- Change to Sprinting Animation while spells are equipped -- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=404



-Warburg
author: Warburg
